articles.author: Adam S. Minsky
articles.title: Student Loan Forgiveness And IDR Plans In Jeopardy After New Supreme Court Decision - Forbes
articles.description: The consequences of this decision will be felt broadly by Americans for many years. But student loan borrowers may be among the first to experience the impacts.
articles.content: WASHINGTON, DC - SEPTEMBER 28: The Supreme Court overruled a 40-year old precedent that could have ... [+] major implications for student loan forgiveness and income-driven repayment plans. (Photo by… [+8347 chars]
